EmailTemplate.description: Your Menu Update request has been received and will be processed ASAP
EmailTemplate.name: FP PH Menu Change - Update Request
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Menu Update request has been received and will be processed ASAP
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Restaurant partner,
Thank you for your message! Your request has been received as # {!Case.CaseNumber} and is currently being processed by our Partner Service Team.
We will do our best to answer you within 24 hours and solve your request.
Regards, Your foodpanda Team
